name: Food Critic Corgi
description:
You can play this game in the browser, but please download it for better quality. (Shadows, AA and all the good stuff.)

Controls:

WASD or ARROW KEYS - Movement
SPACEBAR – Sniff
E - Bark
P - Pause

The Game:

Please help Food Critic Corgi in his task to critic food and not get hit by random objects. Check the food and discard bad food. That's about it.

This is my first try at making a game, so there is only one level at the moment.
Hope you have some fun. Feedback is always appreciated.

Music by: Captive Portal
https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Captive_Portal/Toy_Sounds_Vol_1/Captive_Porta...

Everything else by me.
